scripts.preinstall: mkdirp src/components/bootstrap/ src/components/jQuery src/components/popperJs src/components/fonts/font-awesome src/components/fonts/open-sans
scripts.postinstall: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist/**/ src/components/bootstrap/ && cp -r node_modules/jQuery/dist/jquery.min.js src/components/jQuery/ && cp -r node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js src/components/popperJs/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css src/components/fonts/font-awesome/ && cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/fonts src/components/fonts/font-awesome/ && cp -r node_modules/npm-font-open-sans/open-sans.css src/components/fonts/open-sans/ && cp -r  node_modules/npm-font-open-sans/fonts src/components/fonts/open-sans/fonts/
